results.description: Compare announced EBITDA to mean analyst EBITDA estimate to capture earnings surprise momentum. Applied SUGGESTION1 using two fields (anl4_ebitda_value, est_ebitda). SUGGESTION2 not applicable (no vector fields). SUGGESTION3 not needed (both coverage >0.6). SUGGESTION4 applied by choosing high userCount fields (anl4_ebitda_value userCount=1772). Confidence set to 0.72 because historical EBITDA surprises often predict short-term returns.

Measure recent change in mean EPS estimates to capture analyst sentiment shifts. Used est_eps and its ts_delta. SUGGESTION1 used one primary field (est_eps) and time-series operator. SUGGESTION3 not needed (coverage 0.7848). SUGGESTION4 applied (est_eps userCount=1430). Confidence 0.68 due to reliable relation between estimate revisions and returns.

Cross-check announced EBIT vs mean estimate to find under/over-performance. Used anl4_ebit_value and est_ebit. SUGGESTION1 used two fields; SUGGESTION3 not required (anl4_ebit_value coverage 0.9483). SUGGESTION4 applied (anl4_ebit_value userCount=2248). Confidence 0.74 since EBIT announcements strongly move prices.

Size of sales surprise relative to estimates to capture revenue-driven rallies. Uses actuals_value_currency_code? No — uses actual_sales_value_annual and est_sales. SUGGESTION1 used both fields; SUGGESTION3 not needed (est_sales coverage 0.7458). SUGGESTION4 applied (est_sales userCount=806). Confidence 0.66; revenue surprises less predictive than EPS but still useful.

High stddev of EPS estimates indicates uncertainty; mean-reversion trade on dispersion contraction. Used earnings_per_share_standard_deviation and est_eps. SUGGESTION1 used two fields; SUGGESTION3 not needed (stddev coverage 0.7237). SUGGESTION4 applied (est_eps userCount=1430). Confidence 0.58 because dispersion is noise-prone but can signal volatility.

Change in recommendational consensus (anl4_mark, anl4_total_rec) to capture upgrades/downgrades. SUGGESTION1 used two fields; SUGGESTION3 not needed (anl4_mark coverage 0.6243). SUGGESTION4 applied (anl4_total_rec userCount=1578). Confidence 0.62 since recommendation flows correlate with flows.

results.idea: Free cash flow per share surprise (backfilled)
results.description: FCF per share announced vs estimate; small coverage so ts_backfill used per SUGGESTION3. Fields: free_cash_flow_per_share_reported_value (coverage 0.3514) and est_fcf_ps (coverage 0.4642). SUGGESTION1 used two fields; SUGGESTION4 partially applied (est_fcf_ps userCount=136). Confidence 0.50 because of low coverage even after backfill.

Growth acceleration: EBITDA change vs sales change to find margin expansion. Uses anl4_ebitda_value and actual_sales_value_annual. SUGGESTION1 used both; SUGGESTION3 not necessary (coverage high). SUGGESTION4 applied (anl4_ebitda_value userCount=1772). Confidence 0.70 because margin improvements often precede positive re-ratings.

results.idea: Estimate momentum adjusted by number of analysts
results.description: Weight EPS estimate revisions by change in number of estimates to filter noisy tiny-revision tickers. Uses est_eps and anl4_qf_az_eps_number (num est). SUGGESTION1 used two fields; SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 applied (anl4_qf_az_eps_number userCount=2510). Confidence 0.69 because larger analyst coverage improves signal quality.

Operating cash flow announced vs est_cashflow_op to capture operational strength. Uses cash_flow_from_operations and est_cashflow_op. SUGGESTION1 used both; SUGGESTION3 not needed (coverage ~0.71/0.6518). SUGGESTION4 applied (est_cashflow_op userCount=397). Confidence 0.65 because cash flow beats can be durable.

Momentum in adjusted net income estimates (anl4_adjusted_netincome_ft / est_netprofit_adj). SUGGESTION1 used est_netprofit_adj and anl4_adjusted_netincome_ft; SUGGESTION3 not needed (coverage high). SUGGESTION4 applied (anl4_adjusted_netincome_ft userCount=14086). Confidence 0.71 due to high data support.

Change in reported book value per share vs estimates to catch balance-sheet surprises. Uses book_value_per_share_reported_value and est_bookvalue_ps. SUGGESTION1 used two fields; SUGGESTION3 not needed (coverage ~0.52/0.6751). SUGGESTION4 moderate (est_bookvalue_ps userCount=389). Confidence 0.55; balance sheet moves are slower.

Sharp down revision in capex estimates often forecasts margin improvement. Uses est_capex and anl4_capex_flag (flag signals revisions). SUGGESTION1 used two fields; SUGGESTION3 not needed (est_capex coverage 0.6427). SUGGESTION4 applied (anl4_capex_flag userCount=1788). Confidence 0.60 since capex cuts can be good for cash flow.

Declining net debt vs estimates indicates improving leverage. Uses net_debt_reported_value and est_netdebt. SUGGESTION1 used both; SUGGESTION3 not needed (coverage 0.3883 and 0.5434) — est_netdebt coverage <0.6 so ts_backfill applied to est_netdebt per SUGGESTION3. SUGGESTION4 moderate userCounts. Confidence 0.52 because reported net debt data is sparse.

Announced gross income vs mean estimate to capture core profitability surprise. Uses anl4_gric_value and anl4_gric_mean. SUGGESTION1 used both; coverage ~0.6954/0.6026 so no backfill. SUGGESTION4 applied (anl4_gric_value userCount=1272). Confidence 0.63.

Upward revisions in pretax income estimates (est_ptp) as leading indicator. SUGGESTION1 single field est_ptp; SUGGESTION3 not needed (coverage 0.7527). SUGGESTION4 applied (userCount 265). Confidence 0.64.

Quarterly sales estimate acceleration to capture revenue momentum. Uses sales_estimate_average_quarterly and sales_estimate_count_quarterly. SUGGESTION1 used two fields; coverage high so no backfill. SUGGESTION4 applied (userCount 97). Confidence 0.59.

Large downward R&D revisions may signal margin tailwinds. Uses est_rd_expense and anl4_rd_exp_flag. SUGGESTION1 used two fields; est_rd_expense coverage low (0.3131) so ts_backfill applied per SUGGESTION3. SUGGESTION4 applied (anl4_rd_exp_flag userCount=1527). Confidence 0.48 due to sparse est_rd_expense.

Rising number of upper estimations signals bullish analyst activity. Uses anl4_ady_pu (num upper estimations) and anl4_ady_mean. SUGGESTION1 used two fields; coverage good; SUGGESTION4 applied (anl4_ady_pu userCount=2040). Confidence 0.57.

Falling std of EPS estimates implies rising certainty; trade on contraction. Uses anl4_afv4_dts_spe or anl4_qfv4_dts_spe (EPS std) and est_eps. SUGGESTION1 used two fields; coverage ~0.691/0.7848 so ok. SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Free cash flow trend vs sales
results.description: FCF growth faster than sales growth implies improving conversion. Uses est_fcf and est_sales. SUGGESTION1 used two fields; est_fcf coverage 0.5777 so no backfill but moderate. SUGGESTION4 applied (est_sales userCount=806). Confidence 0.61.

Large broker participation shifts (anl4_baz1v110_bk / anl4_baz1v110_person) filtered with recommendation score. SUGGESTION1 used anl4_baz1v110_prevval and anl4_basicdetailrec_ratingvalue. Coverage moderate; SUGGESTION4 applied (high userCounts). Confidence 0.50 due to heterogeneity across brokers.

Announcement vs guidance for funds from operations (anl4_ffo_flag and min_adjusted_funds_from_operations_guidance). SUGGESTION1 used two fields; guidance fields have full coverage so fine. SUGGESTION4 applied (anl4_ffo_flag userCount=325). Confidence 0.53.

Big positive revisions in total assets estimates may indicate M&A or growth; uses est_tot_assets and anl4_totassets_value. SUGGESTION1 used two fields; coverage ~0.7522/0.6486. SUGGESTION4 applied (est_tot_assets userCount=437). Confidence 0.47.

Upward shifts in dividend estimates often precede positive returns in dividend-sensitive names. Uses anl4_afv4_div_mean and anl4_qfv4_div_number. SUGGESTION1 used both; coverage ~0.8232/0.4857 so second has lower coverage but acceptable. SUGGESTION4 partially applied. Confidence 0.54.

Reported SG&A below guidance predicts margin expansion. Uses selling_general_admin_expense_reported_value and est_sga. SUGGESTION1 used two fields; est_sga coverage 0.5121 so near threshold—no backfill yet. SUGGESTION4 small userCount but signal intuitive. Confidence 0.45.

results.idea: Book value momentum vs tangible book estimate
results.description: Tangible book value revisions (anl4_tbvps_median / anl4_tbve_ft) to find balance-sheet improvements. SUGGESTION1 used two fields; tbvps coverage low (0.3321) so ts_backfill applied to anl4_tbvps_median per SUGGESTION3. SUGGESTION4 used high userCount for tbv_ft. Confidence 0.40 due to sparse data.

Reported pretax income vs previous estimate (pretax_income_reported and anl4_ptp_prevval). SUGGESTION1 used both; previous estimate field coverage was high (eps_previous_estimate_value etc.). SUGGESTION3 not needed. Confidence 0.62 given pretax moves importance.

results.idea: Number of forecasts increase as traction signal
results.description: Rising sales_estimate_count or anl4_netprofit_number signals increasing analyst attention; use counts as leading flow proxy. SUGGESTION1 used sales_estimate_count and anl4_netprofit_number. SUGGESTION4 applied (high counts). Confidence 0.49 as attention alone can be noisy.

results.idea: Earnings quality: EBITDA vs EBITDA estimates divergence
results.description: Large divergence between reported anl4_ebit_value and anl4_ebitda_value indicates non-operational noise; combine to filter noisy names. SUGGESTION1 used both; coverage high. SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Cash flow per share revision momentum
results.description: Momentum in cash flow per share estimates (anl4_afv4_cfps_mean / est_cashflow_ps). est_cashflow_ps coverage low (0.3273) so ts_backfill applied to avoid holes as per SUGGESTION3. SUGGESTION1 used two fields; SUGGESTION4 moderate. Confidence 0.46.

Actual adjusted EPS vs adjusted EPS mean estimate (anl4_afv4_eps_mean / est_epsa). SUGGESTION1 used both; est_epsa coverage low (0.1579) so favor anl4_afv4_eps_mean which has full coverage. SUGGESTION3 applied to est_epsa if used, but here rely on anl4_afv4_eps_mean. Confidence 0.67.

Shifts in total_goodwill_reported_value vs anl4_totgw_mean to detect write-offs or acquisitions. SUGGESTION1 used two fields; coverage moderate so no backfill. SUGGESTION4 moderate userCounts. Confidence 0.41.

Operating profit before depr/amort vs est_ebitda to find margin surprises. SUGGESTION1 used operating_profit_before_depr_amort and est_ebitda; both coverage >0.6. SUGGESTION4 applied partly. Confidence 0.66.

Large downward guidance in stock option expense improves EPS; uses stock_option_expense_max_guidance and min_stock_option_expense_guidance. SUGGESTION1 used both; coverage full. SUGGESTION4 low userCounts but signal direct. Confidence 0.44.
Difference between net_profit_adjusted_value and net_profit_reported_value signals one-offs. SUGGESTION1 used both fields; coverage high. SUGGESTION4 moderate. Confidence 0.55.

Unexpected large investing cash flows can indicate asset sales or capex bursts. Uses cash_flow_from_investing and est_cashflow_invst. SUGGESTION1 applied; coverage moderate. SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.48.

Rising shares_outstanding_max_guidance presages dilution; short names with rising guidance. Uses shares_outstanding_max_guidance and min_basic_shares_guidance. SUGGESTION1 used two fields; coverage full. Confidence 0.42.

High variation between brokers (anl4_eaz2lrec_ratingvalue dispersion) indicates disagreement; contrarian plays on dispersion contraction. SUGGESTION1 used anl4_eaz2lrec_ratingvalue; SUGGESTION2 not applicable. SUGGESTION4 applied (userCount high). Confidence 0.53.

Large variance between guidance_value_currency_code_qtr and actuals_reporting_currency? Not numeric — use guidance_value vs actual_sales_value_quarterly. SUGGESTION1 used sales_guidance_value_quarterly and actual_sales_value_quarterly; sales_guidance coverage low so ts_backfill applied per SUGGESTION3. Confidence 0.60.

Short-term z-score of EPS actual vs forecast to trade momentum right after releases. Uses earnings_per_share_reported and anl4_afv4_eps_mean. SUGGESTION1 used two fields; coverage high. SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.73.

Operating cash flow growth faster than net profit growth signals quality. Uses cash_flow_from_operations and net_profit_reported_value. SUGGESTION1 used both; coverage moderate. SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.62.

Companies issuing higher max guidance values across metrics tend to outperform. Use maximum_guidance_value and maximum_guidance_value (as proxy) — instead use maximum_guidance_value and minimum_guidance_value to trade change. SUGGESTION1 used two fields; coverage moderate. Confidence 0.50.
A falling anl4_ady_low indicates fewer pessimistic revisions; bullish. SUGGESTION1 used anl4_ady_low; SUGGESTION4 applied (userCount available). Confidence 0.55.
Falling an l4_median_capexp suggests capex cuts and margin tailwinds. SUGGESTION1 used anl4_median_capexp; coverage 0.6173. SUGGESTION4 moderate. Confidence 0.51.
Use ts_ir of pretax income estimates to find stable improving names. Uses ts_ir(est_ptp, 120). SUGGESTION1 used single field; SUGGESTION3 not needed. Confidence 0.48.
Compare short-term est_eps growth to long-term est_eps growth to find acceleration. Uses est_eps only with ts_delta over two horizons. SUGGESTION1 single field; SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.60.

Detect large positive deviations in broker-level est (anl4_baz1v110_estvalue) relative to consensus (est_eps) to front-run influence. SUGGESTION1 used two fields; anl4_baz1v110_estvalue coverage ~0.4151 so ts_backfill applied per SUGGESTION3. Confidence 0.45.

results.idea: Free cash flow per share momentum (reported)
results.description: Use free_cash_flow_per_share_actual_value vs previous guidance to capture real improvements; actual coverage low so apply ts_backfill. SUGGESTION1 used two fields and SUGGESTION3 applied to actual. Confidence 0.47.

Momentum in adjusted funds from operations (min_adjusted_funds_from_operations_guidance vs max) to capture operational guidance change. SUGGESTION1 used the guidance pair; coverage full. Confidence 0.50.
Use ts_kurtosis or ts_kurtosis(est_eps,90) to detect tails in EPS history. SUGGESTION1 used est_eps; SUGGESTION2 not applicable. Confidence 0.44 because kurtosis signals are volatile.
High sales_estimate_standard_deviation indicates disagreement; trade on resolution. SUGGESTION1 used sales_estimate_standard_deviation and est_sales. SUGGESTION3 not required. Confidence 0.54.
Use ts_returns on est_eps to capture persistent upward revisions. SUGGESTION1 used est_eps with ts_returns. SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.58.

Change in book_value_per_share_reported_value relative to market metric est_pb (use est_bookvalue_ps and book_value_per_share_reported_value). SUGGESTION1 used two fields; coverage acceptable. Confidence 0.46.

results.idea: Earnings surprise signal scaled by number of forecasts
results.description: Scale EPS surprise by qfv4_eps_number to downweight low-coverage surprises. Uses anl4_qf_az_eps_mean and anl4_qf_az_eps_number. SUGGESTION1 used both; SUGGESTION4 high userCount. Confidence 0.66.
Falling anl4_dts_ptp (pretax std) indicates consensus forming; trade contraction. SUGGESTION1 single field; coverage moderate. Confidence 0.43.

Operating cashflow_reported_value vs anl4_cfo_median to detect operational surprises. SUGGESTION1 used both; coverage ~0.5809/0.6232 so apply ts_backfill to lower one if needed; here acceptable. Confidence 0.59.
ts_ir of est_eps to find persistent improvement relative to volatility. SUGGESTION1 used est_eps; SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.52.
Actual_sales_value_quarterly minus sales_guidance_value_quarterly (backfilled) to capture beat magnitude. SUGGESTION3 applied to guidance (coverage 0.3262). SUGGESTION4 used. Confidence 0.61.
Reported capex vs est_capex to detect large swings. SUGGESTION1 used anl4_capex_value and est_capex. Coverage acceptable. Confidence 0.50.

results.idea: Adjusted EPS momentum filtered by FCF flag
results.description: Combine est_epsa momentum with anl4_fcf_flag to favor changes where free cash flow forecast is improving. SUGGESTION1 used two fields; est_epsa coverage low so prefer ts_backfill when needed but here use flag only. SUGGESTION4 applied (fcf_flag userCount=462). Confidence 0.56.
Use an l4_netprofit_median ts_delta to find improving profitability consensus. SUGGESTION1 single field; coverage 0.7667. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Earnings per share median vs mean divergence
results.description: Difference between anl4_afv4_median_eps and anl4_afv4_eps_mean indicates skew in forecasts; contrarian when skew collapses. SUGGESTION1 used both; coverage full. Confidence 0.47.
Large changes in financing cash flow (cff_value vs an l4_cff_median) may indicate buybacks or debt changes. SUGGESTION1 used both; coverage moderate. Confidence 0.44.

Use tangible_book_value_per_share_guidance (max/min) vs est_tbv_ps (backfill if sparse) to find balance sheet revaluations. SUGGESTION3 applied where est_tbv_ps coverage low (0.3473). SUGGESTION1 used two fields. Confidence 0.39.

Quarterly SG&A reported vs estimate to catch cost-control triggers. Uses selling_general_admin_expense_actual_value and selling_general_admin_expense_reported_value. SUGGESTION1 used both; coverage moderate. Confidence 0.45.
Use anl4_buy and anl4_under ratio changes to detect sentiment shifts. SUGGESTION1 used both; coverage moderate. SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.51.

results.idea: Earnings surprise scaled by broker rating changes
results.description: Scale EPS surprise by recent broker rating changes (anl4_basicdetailrec_ratingvalue). SUGGESTION1 used two fields; SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.57.
Compare short-term sales surprise to longer-term surprise to find persistent beats. Uses actual_sales_value_annual and est_sales. SUGGESTION1 used both; coverage high. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: EBITDA estimate acceleration vs std dev
results.description: Rising est_ebitda momentum with falling anl4_ebitda_std (std dev) is strong signal. SUGGESTION1 used both; anl4_ebitda_std coverage ~0.5831 so moderate. SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.60.
Long-term upward drift in net_income_adjusted indicates improving fundamentals. Uses net_income_adjusted. SUGGESTION1 single field; coverage high. Confidence 0.55.
Abnormal jumps in total_assets_amount vs historical mean signal structural events. SUGGESTION1 used total_assets_amount; coverage 0.8035. Confidence 0.43.
Momentum in pretax_income_reported (quarterly) vs est_ptp. SUGGESTION1 used both; coverage high. Confidence 0.61.
Increase in anl4_basicconafv110_numest confirms revisions; use as filter on est_eps changes. SUGGESTION1 used both fields; coverage good. SUGGESTION4 high userCount. Confidence 0.58.
Sharp drops in total_goodwill_actual_value vs estimate indicate potential overreaction. SUGGESTION1 used both; coverage low-moderate. Confidence 0.38.

results.idea: Earnings quality: adjusted vs GAAP gap
results.description: Gap between anl4_af_eps_value (actual EPS) and earnings_per_share_reported indicates adjustments; shrinkage signals quality. SUGGESTION1 used both; coverage high. Confidence 0.52.

results.idea: Operating cashflow surprise scaled by asset base
results.description: Divide operating cashflow surprise by total assets to normalize across firms. Uses operating_cashflow_reported_value and total_assets_amount. SUGGESTION1 used both; coverage moderate. Confidence 0.49.

results.idea: Earnings surprise persistence filter by standard deviation
results.description: Take EPS surprise and downweight where earnings_per_share_standard_deviation is high. SUGGESTION1 used both fields; SUGGESTION4 low userCount but useful. Confidence 0.60.
Use ts_ir(est_sales, 180) to find names where sales estimates are improving with low volatility. SUGGESTION1 used est_sales; SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.54.

Actual_dividend_value_quarterly vs dividend_estimate_average (backfill low coverage) to capture dividend policy changes. SUGGESTION3 applied to dividend_estimate_average (coverage 0.6151 borderline). Confidence 0.46.

results.idea: Free cash flow to equity surprise
results.description: free_cash_flow_total vs est_fcf to detect unexpectedly strong cash conversion. SUGGESTION1 used both; coverage moderate. Confidence 0.53.

results.idea: Total assets median revision vs mean
results.description: Difference between anl4_totassets_median and est_tot_assets highlights distributional shifts; trade when median rises faster. SUGGESTION1 used both; coverage good. Confidence 0.44.

results.idea: Number of upper estimations vs lower estimations spread
results.description: anl4_adxqfv110_pu minus anl4_adxqfv110_low to measure skew of analyst sentiment. SUGGESTION1 used both; coverage ~0.6979. Confidence 0.50.

results.idea: Earnings surprise with low forecast dispersion
results.description: High EPS surprise combined with low earnings std (anl4_afv4_dts_spe) to pick reliable beats. SUGGESTION1 used both; SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.68.
Rising anl4_ptp_median momentum indicates improving profitability consensus. SUGGESTION1 single field; coverage moderate. Confidence 0.50.

results.idea: Cash Flow Per Share beat significance
results.description: Anl4_af_cfps_value (actual CFPS) minus anl4_qfv4_cfps_mean scaled by number of estimates to gauge significance. SUGGESTION1 used both; coverage for median low so apply backfill if necessary. Confidence 0.48.
Use anl4_afv4_eps_number clusters rising with positive est_eps revisions as confirmation. SUGGESTION1 used two fields; coverage good. Confidence 0.56.
sales_estimate_median_quarterly vs sales_estimate_average_quarterly divergence to detect skewed expectations. SUGGESTION1 used both; coverage full. Confidence 0.43.
Select names with rising est_fcf but low anl4_fcf_std to reduce noise. SUGGESTION1 used both; coverage moderate. Confidence 0.52.
Long-term growth in book_value_per_share_reported_value vs est_bookvalue_ps persistence signal. SUGGESTION1 used both; coverage moderate. Confidence 0.45.

results.idea: Earnings re-rating when broker median upgrades
results.description: Use anl4_eaz2lrec_ratingvalue median shifts to filter EPS surprises. SUGGESTION1 used two fields; applied SUGGESTION4 (high userCount). Confidence 0.59.
anl4_capex_median vs anl4_capex_value to find unexpected capex changes. SUGGESTION1 used both; coverage moderate. Confidence 0.46.

results.idea: EPS lead by cashflow from operations
results.description: Rising cashflow_from_operations ahead of est_eps increases conviction; use lead-lag via ts_corr. SUGGESTION1 used cash_flow_from_operations and est_eps. SUGGESTION3 not needed. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Sales estimate count as liquidity proxy
results.description: Rising sales_estimate_count indicates growing analyst interest and potential price impact; use as a momentum filter. SUGGESTION1 used single field; coverage full. Confidence 0.48.

results.idea: Earnings surprise scaled by historical drawdown
results.description: Scale EPS surprise by ts_max_diff of est_eps to prioritize names with low historical drawdown. SUGGESTION1 used two operators on est_eps only. Confidence 0.50.
Use anl4_ptp_flag changes with est_ptp momentum to find flagged upward revisions. SUGGESTION1 used both; coverage strong. Confidence 0.54.
Declining dividend_estimate_stddev_quarterly (low coverage) signals consensus and lower risk; apply ts_backfill if necessary. SUGGESTION3 applied due to low coverage. Confidence 0.38.

Combine est_eps acceleration with cashflow_per_share_actual to confirm fundamental support. SUGGESTION1 used est_eps and anl4_af_cfps_value; cashflow coverage low so ts_backfill may be used. SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.62.
Rising anl4_netprofita_mean momentum indicates improving adjusted profits. SUGGESTION1 used single field; coverage 0.7511. Confidence 0.56.
Narrowing range between sales_estimate_maximum and sales_estimate_minimum suggests stronger consensus; trade contraction. SUGGESTION1 used both; coverage full. Confidence 0.41.

results.idea: Operating profit surprise filtered by number of estimates
results.description: Scale operating profit surprise by anl4_ebitda_number to ensure significance. SUGGESTION1 used anl4_ebitda_value and anl4_ebitda_number; coverage moderate. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Earnings surprise with low analyst churn
results.description: Use anl4_basicconafv110_numest delta low (stable analyst base) to prefer surprises where analysts remain. SUGGESTION1 used numest and est_eps; coverage good. Confidence 0.53.
